TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SessionStateStoreProviderBase extends System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase
Public MustInherit Class SessionStateStoreProviderBase Inherits ProviderBase

summary.span: 為資料存放區定義工作階段狀態提供者的所需成員。

span.span: Defines the required members of a session-state provider for a data store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 工作階段狀態讀取，並將所接收及使用工作階段狀態資料存放區的工作階段資料存放區提供者。ASP.NET session state reads and writes session data from and to a data store using a session-state store provider. 工作階段狀態存放區提供者是繼承的類別抽象類別並覆寫其成員與實作特殊的資料存放區。A session-state store provider is a class that inherits the abstract class and overrides its members with implementations specific to the data store. 工作階段狀態存放區提供者會呼叫期間與資料存放區的儲存體進行 ASP.NET 網頁的處理和擷取工作階段變數與相關的工作階段資訊，例如逾時值的類別。The session-state store provider is called by the class during the processing of an ASP.NET page to communicate with the data store for the storage and retrieval of session variables and related session information such as the time-out value. 每個 ASP.NET 應用程式內的工作階段資料會分別儲存每個屬性。Session data within each ASP.NET application is stored separately for each property. ASP.NET 應用程式不會共用工作階段資料。ASP.NET applications do not share session data. 您可以指定自訂藉由設定 ASP.NET 應用程式實作`mode`屬性`sessionState`組態項目和`customProvider`做為此屬性的自訂提供者名稱本主題的範例所示。You can specify a custom implementation for an ASP.NET application by setting the `mode` attribute of the `sessionState` configuration element to and the `customProvider` attribute to the name of the custom provider, as shown in the example for this topic. ## 鎖定的工作階段儲存資料Locking Session Store Data 因為 ASP.NET 應用程式是多執行緒來支援並行要求的回應，很可能在並行要求可能會嘗試存取相同的工作階段資訊。Because ASP.NET applications are multithreaded to support responding to concurrent requests, it is possible that concurrent requests might attempt to access the same session information. 假設所有框架組中的多個框架存取相同的應用程式的位置。Consider a scenario where multiple frames in a frameset all access the same application. 框架組中的每個畫面格的個別要求可以同時在不同的執行緒在 Web 伺服器上執行。The separate requests for each frame in the frameset can be executed on the Web server concurrently on different threads. 如果 ASP.NET 網頁，針對每個框架來源存取工作階段狀態變數，您可以有多個執行緒同時存取工作階段的存放區。If the ASP.NET pages for each frame source access session-state variables, then you could have multiple threads accessing the session store concurrently. 若要避免資料衝突的工作階段存放區和非預期的工作階段狀態行為和類別包含鎖定功能，以獨佔方式鎖定的持續時間的特定工作階段的工作階段的存放區項目ASP.NET 網頁的執行。To avoid data collisions at the session store and unexpected session-state behavior, the and classes include lock functionality that exclusively locks the session store item for a particular session for the duration of the execution of an ASP.NET page. 請注意，即使如果屬性標示為`ReadOnly`，可能可以寫入至工作階段存放區中，以便從存放區資料仍可能會結束等待唯讀的工作階段要求鎖定的資料是相同的應用程式中的其他 ASP.NET 網頁釋出。Note that even if the attribute is marked as `ReadOnly`, other ASP.NET pages in the same application might be able to write to the session store, so a request for read-only session data from the store might still end up waiting for locked data to be freed. 工作階段存放區資料的要求，請在呼叫開頭上設定鎖定方法。A lock is set on session-store data at the beginning of the request, in the call to the method. 當要求完成時，會釋放鎖定的呼叫期間方法。When the request completes, the lock is released during the call to the method. 如果物件在呼叫期間所遇到已鎖定的工作階段資料或方法，它將重新要求工作階段資料半秒的間隔之前或釋放鎖定的時間量，已鎖定工作階段資料的值屬性。If the object encounters locked session data during the call to either the or the method, it will re-request the session data at half-second intervals until either the lock is released or the amount of time that the session data has been locked exceeds the value of the property. 如果超過執行逾時，物件會呼叫釋放工作階段存放區資料，並在該時間要求的工作階段存放區資料的方法。If the execution time out is exceeded, the object will call the method to free the session-store data and request the session-store data at that time. 因為鎖定工作階段存放區資料可能已由呼叫釋放方法的呼叫之前的另一個執行緒上目前回應的方法，將無法嘗試要設定和發行工作階段狀態存放區的資料已經發行並由另一個工作階段修改。Because locked session-store data might have been freed by a call to the method on a separate thread before the call to the method for the current response, an attempt could be made to set and release session-state store data that has already been released and modified by another session. 若要避免此情況下，和方法傳回的鎖定識別碼。To avoid this situation, the and methods return a lock identifier. 這個鎖定識別碼必須是包含要修改已鎖定的工作階段儲存資料的每個要求。This lock identifier must be included with each request to modify locked session-store data. 工作階段存放區資料，才能修改資料存放區中的鎖定識別碼符合所提供的鎖定識別碼。Session-store data is modified only if the lock identifier in the data store matches the lock identifier supplied by the . ## 刪除過期的工作階段儲存資料Deleting Expired Session Store Data 當方法針對特定工作階段呼叫，該工作階段資料會刪除從資料存放區使用方法; 否則資料將保留在工作階段資料存放區伺服器未來要求工作階段。When the method is called for a particular session, the data for that session is deleted from the data store using the method; otherwise, the data will remain in the session data store to server future requests for the session. 它會刪除過期的工作階段資料的實作。It is up to the implementation to delete expired session data. ## Examples 如需工作階段狀態存放區提供者實作的範例，請參閱[實作工作階段狀態存放區提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66)。For an example of a session-state store provider implementation, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66). 下列程式碼範例顯示已設定為使用自訂的工作階段狀態存放區提供者的 ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案。The following code example shows the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application that is configured to use a custom session-state store provider. ``` ```

MemberSignature.Value: protected SessionStateStoreProviderBase ();

Protected Sub New ()
protected: SessionStateStoreProviderBase();

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您不需要實作繼承的類別的建構函式抽象類別。You are not required to implement a constructor for a class that inherits the abstract class. 初始化值實作會傳遞至方法實作。Initialization values for a implementation are passed to the method implementation. ## Examples 如需工作階段狀態存放區提供者實作的範例，請參閱[實作工作階段狀態存放區提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66)。For an example of a session-state store provider implementation, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66).

summary.span: 建立要用於目前要求的新 物件。

span.span: Creates a new object to be used for the current request.
A new for the current request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件會呼叫ASP.NET 網頁，要求的起始處方法期間事件。The object calls the method at the beginning of a request for an ASP.NET page, during the event. 呼叫方法時若：The method is called if: - 傳入的要求有任何工作階段識別碼，或the incoming request has no session ID, or - 傳入的要求有工作階段 ID，但資料存放區中找不到工作階段。the incoming request has a session ID, but the session is not found in the data store. 方法建立新具有空白物件物件集合，並指定`timeout`值。The method creates a new object with an empty object, an collection, and the specified `timeout` value. ASP.NET 應用程式的集合可以使用擷取方法。The collection for the ASP.NET application can be retrieved using the method. ## Examples 如需工作階段狀態存放區提供者實作的範例，請參閱[實作工作階段狀態存放區提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66)。For an example of a session-state store provider implementation, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66).

summary.span: 將新的工作階段狀態項目加入資料存放區。

span.span: Adds a new session-state item to the data store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法搭配工作階段時`cookieless`和`regenerateExpiredSessionId`屬性都`true`。The method is used with sessions when the `cookieless` and `regenerateExpiredSessionId` attributes are both `true`. 具有`regenerateExpiredSessionId attribute`設`true`導致物件來產生新時已過期的值遇到值。Having the `regenerateExpiredSessionId attribute` set to `true` causes the object to generate a new value when an expired value is encountered. 產生新的程序值仍必須將瀏覽器重新導向至包含新產生的 URL值。The process of generating a new value requires redirecting the browser to a URL that contains the newly generated value. 包含過期的初始要求期間會呼叫方法值。The method is called during the initial request that contains an expired value. 之後物件取得新值來取代過期的值，它會呼叫方法，將未初始化的項目加入至工作階段狀態資料存放區。After the object acquires a new value to replace the expired value, it calls the method to add an uninitialized entry to the session-state data store. 瀏覽器會重新導向至包含新產生的 URL值。The browser is then redirected to the URL containing the newly generated value. 未初始化的項目，工作階段資料存放區中是否存在時，可確保重新導向的要求，其中包含新產生值不被誤認為要求過期的工作階段，相反地，即視為新的工作階段。The existence of the uninitialized entry in the session data store ensures that the redirected request that includes the newly generated value is not mistaken for a request for an expired session and is, instead, treated as a new session. 工作階段資料存放區中未初始化的項目都與新產生值，並只包含預設值，包括到期日期和時間值，對應為`actionFlags`參數和方法。The uninitialized entry in the session data store is associated with the newly generated value and contains only default values, including an expiration date and time and a value that corresponds to the `actionFlags` parameter of the and methods. 工作階段狀態存放區中未初始化的項目應該包含`actionFlags`值等於列舉值。The uninitialized entry in the session-state store should include an `actionFlags` value equal to the enumeration value. 這個值會傳遞至物件和方法，並通知物件目前的工作階段是新但未初始化的工作階段。This value is passed to the object by the and methods, and informs the object that the current session is a new but uninitialized session. 物件接著會在初始化新的工作階段，並引發`Session_OnStart`事件。The object will then initialize the new session and raise the `Session_OnStart` event. 如需無 cookie 工作階段的詳細資訊，請參閱屬性。For more information about cookieless sessions, see the property. ## Examples 如需工作階段狀態存放區提供者實作的範例，請參閱[實作工作階段狀態存放區提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66)。For an example of a session-state store provider implementation, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66).

summary.span: 釋放 實作所使用的所有資源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法時，會呼叫方法執行的應用程式定義域的結尾。The method is called when the method executes at the closing of the application domain. 繼承的類別類別可以使用這個方法，以釋出不再使用中的任何資源。Classes that inherit the class can use this method to free any resources no longer in use. ## Examples 如需工作階段狀態存放區提供者實作的範例，請參閱[實作工作階段狀態存放區提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66)。For an example of a session-state store provider implementation, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66).

summary.span: 物件在要求結束時呼叫。

span.span: Called by the object at the end of a request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件會呼叫ASP.NET 網頁，要求結尾方法期間事件。The object calls the method at the end of a request for an ASP.NET page, during the event. 您可以使用方法，以執行任何您的工作階段狀態存放區提供者所需的每個要求清除作業。You can use the method to perform any per-request cleanup required by your session-state store provider. ## Examples 如需工作階段狀態存放區提供者實作的範例，請參閱[實作工作階段狀態存放區提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66)。For an example of a session-state store provider implementation, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66).

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData GetItem (System.Web.HttpContext context, string id, out bool locked, out TimeSpan lockAge, out object lockId, out System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateActions actions);

Public MustOverride Function GetItem (context As HttpContext, id As String, ByRef locked As Boolean, ByRef lockAge As TimeSpan, ByRef lockId As Object, ByRef actions As SessionStateActions) As SessionStateStoreData

span.span: When this method returns, contains one of the values, indicating whether the current session is an uninitialized, cookieless session.

summary.span: 從工作階段資料存放區傳回唯讀工作階段狀態資料。

span.span: Returns read-only session-state data from the session data store.

returns.span: 填入工作階段資料存放區之工作階段值和資訊的 。

span.span: A populated with session values and information from the session data store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件會呼叫方法的要求，開頭期間事件，當屬性設為`ReadOnly`。The object calls the method at the beginning of a request, during the event, when the attribute is set to `ReadOnly`. 如果屬性設為`true`、物件會改為呼叫方法。If the attribute is set to `true`, the object instead calls the method. 方法會傳回物件填入資料存放區的工作階段資訊和更新的工作階段資料的到期日。The method returns a object populated with session information from the data store and updates the expiration date of the session data. 如果沒有工作階段項目資料在資料存放區中，找到方法會設定`locked``out`參數`false`並傳回`null`。If no session-item data is found at the data store, the method sets the `locked` `out` parameter to `false` and returns `null`. 這會導致物件呼叫方法，以在資料存放區中建立新的工作階段項目。This causes the object to call the method to create a new session item in the data store. 如果工作階段項目資料位於資料存放區，但資料已被鎖定，方法會設定`locked``out`參數`true`，設定`lockAge``out`參數目前的日期和時間減去的日期與項目已鎖定時的時間 （這會從資料存放區），設定`lockId``out`鎖定識別項的參數從資料存放區，並傳回擷取`null`。If session-item data is found at the data store but the data is locked, the method sets the `locked` `out` parameter to `true`, sets the `lockAge` `out` parameter to the current date and time minus the date and time when the item was locked (which is retrieved from the data store), sets the `lockId` `out` parameter to the lock identifier retrieved from the data store, and returns `null`. 這會導致物件呼叫再次半秒的間隔之後嘗試擷取工作階段項目資訊的方法。This causes the object to call the method again after a half-second interval to attempt to retrieve the session-item information. 如果值的`lockAge``out`參數設定為超過值，然後在物件會呼叫方法，以清除工作階段項目資料，然後呼叫上的鎖定方法一次。If the value that the `lockAge` `out` parameter is set to exceed the value, then the object calls the method to clear the lock on the session-item data, and then calls the method again. `actionFlags`參數使用時同時`cookieless`和`regenerateExpiredSessionId`屬性設定為`true`。The `actionFlags` parameter is used when both the `cookieless` and `regenerateExpiredSessionId` attributes are set to `true`. `actionFlags`值設定為表示工作階段資料存放區中的項目是新的工作階段需要初始化的。An `actionFlags` value set to indicates that the entry in the session data store is a new session that requires initialization. 工作階段資料存放區中未初始化的項目會建立由呼叫方法。Uninitialized entries in the session data store are created by a call to the method. 如果從工作階段資料存放區的項目不是未初始化的項目，`actionFlags`參數會設定為零。If the item from the session data store is not an uninitialized item, the `actionFlags` parameter will be set to zero. 支援無 cookie 工作階段的自訂工作階段狀態存放區實作者應該設定`actionFlags``out`參數的值傳回的工作階段資料存放區中，為目前的項目。Custom session-state store implementers that support cookieless sessions should set the `actionFlags` `out` parameter to the value returned from the session data store for the current item. 如果`actionFlags`參數值會要求工作階段存放區項目等於列舉值，然後在方法應該將值設定為零之後設定資料存放區中`actionFlags``out`參數。If the `actionFlags` parameter value for the requested session-store item equals the enumeration value, then the method should set the value in the data store to zero after setting the `actionFlags` `out` parameter. ## Examples 如需工作階段狀態存放區提供者實作的範例，請參閱[實作工作階段狀態存放區提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66)。For an example of a session-state store provider implementation, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66).

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData GetItemExclusive (System.Web.HttpContext context, string id, out bool locked, out TimeSpan lockAge, out object lockId, out System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateActions actions);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData GetItemExclusive(class System.Web.HttpContext context, string id, [out] bool& locked, [out] valuetype System.TimeSpan& lockAge, [out] object& lockId, [out] valuetype System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateActions& actions) cil managed

Public MustOverride Function GetItemExclusive (context As HttpContext, id As String, ByRef locked As Boolean, ByRef lockAge As TimeSpan, ByRef lockId As Object, ByRef actions As SessionStateActions) As SessionStateStoreData

public: abstract System::Web::SessionState::SessionStateStoreData ^ GetItemExclusive(System::Web::HttpContext ^ context, System::String ^ id, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] bool % locked, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] TimeSpan % lockAge, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::Object ^ % lockId, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::Web::SessionState::SessionStateActions % actions);

param.name: context

param.name: locked
param.span: 這個方法傳回時，包含布林值，如果已成功取得鎖定，則該值會設定為 ，否則會設定為 。

span.span: When this method returns, contains a Boolean value that is set to if a lock is successfully obtained; otherwise, .

param.name: lockAge
param.span: 這個方法傳回時，包含 物件，該物件設定為工作階段資料存放區中已鎖定項目的時間長度。

span.span: When this method returns, contains a object that is set to the amount of time that an item in the session data store has been locked.

param.name: lockId
param.span: 這個方法傳回時，包含設定為目前要求之鎖定識別項的物件。

span.span: When this method returns, contains an object that is set to the lock identifier for the current request.

param.span: 如需鎖定識別項的詳細資訊，請參閱 類別摘要中的＜鎖定工作階段存放區資料＞。

span.span: For details on the lock identifier, see "Locking Session-Store Data" in the class summary.

param.name: actions
param.span: 這個方法傳回時，包含其中一個 值，指出目前的工作階段是否為未初始化之無 Cookie 的工作階段。

span.span: When this method returns, contains one of the values, indicating whether the current session is an uninitialized, cookieless session.

summary.span: 從工作階段資料存放區傳回唯讀工作階段狀態資料。

span.span: Returns read-only session-state data from the session data store.

returns.span: 填入工作階段資料存放區之工作階段值和資訊的 。

span.span: A populated with session values and information from the session data store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件會呼叫方法的要求，開頭期間事件，當屬性設為`true`，預設值。The object calls the method at the beginning of a request, during the event, when the attribute is set to `true`, which is the default. 如果屬性設為`ReadOnly`、物件會改為呼叫方法。If the attribute is set to `ReadOnly`, the object instead calls the method. 方法會傳回填入資料存放區中，從工作階段資訊的物件更新儲存的資料的到期日，並要求的持續時間內鎖定資料存放區的工作階段項目資料。The method returns a object populated with session information from the data store, updates the expiration date of the stored data, and locks the session-item data at the data store for the duration of the request. 如果沒有工作階段項目資料在資料存放區中，找到方法會設定`locked``out`參數`false`並傳回`null`。If no session-item data is found at the data store, the method sets the `locked` `out` parameter to `false` and returns `null`. 這會導致物件呼叫方法，以在資料存放區中建立新的工作階段項目。This causes the object to call the method to create a new session item in the data store. 如果工作階段項目資料位於資料存放區，但資料已被鎖定，方法會設定`locked``out`參數`true`，設定`lockAge``out`參數目前的日期和時間減去的日期與項目已鎖定時的時間 （這會從資料存放區），設定`lockId``out`鎖定識別項的參數從資料存放區，並傳回擷取`null`。If session-item data is found at the data store but the data is locked, the method sets the `locked` `out` parameter to `true`, sets the `lockAge` `out` parameter to the current date and time minus the date and time when the item was locked (which is retrieved from the data store), sets the `lockId` `out` parameter to the lock identifier retrieved from the data store, and returns `null`. 這會導致物件呼叫再次半秒的間隔之後嘗試擷取工作階段項目資訊並將資料上取得鎖定的方法。This causes the object to call the method again after a half-second interval to attempt to retrieve the session-item information and obtain a lock on the data. 如果值的`lockAge``out`參數設定為超過值，然後在呼叫方法，以清除工作階段項目資料，然後呼叫上的鎖定方法一次。If the value that the `lockAge` `out` parameter is set to exceeds the value, then the calls the method to clear the lock on the session-item data, and then calls the method again. `actionFlags`參數使用時`cookieless`和`regenerateExpiredSessionId`屬性都設定為`true`。The `actionFlags` parameter is used when the `cookieless` and `regenerateExpiredSessionId` attributes are both set to `true`. `actionFlags`值設定為表示工作階段資料存放區中的項目是新的工作階段需要初始化的。An `actionFlags` value set to indicates that the entry in the session data store is a new session that requires initialization. 工作階段資料存放區中未初始化的項目會建立由呼叫方法。Uninitialized entries in the session data store are created by a call to the method. 如果從工作階段資料存放區的項目不是未初始化的項目，`actionFlags`參數會設定為零。If the item from the session data store is not an uninitialized item, the `actionFlags` parameter will be set to zero. 支援無 cookie 工作階段的自訂工作階段狀態存放區實作者應該設定`actionFlags``out`參數的值傳回的工作階段資料存放區中，為目前的項目。Custom session-state store implementers that support cookieless sessions should set the `actionFlags` `out` parameter to the value returned from the session data store for the current item. 如果`actionFlags`參數值會要求工作階段存放區項目等於列舉值，然後在方法應該將值設定為零之後設定資料存放區中`actionFlags``out`參數。If the `actionFlags` parameter value for the requested session-store item equals the enumeration value, then the method should set the value in the data store to zero after setting the `actionFlags` `out` parameter. ## Examples 如需工作階段狀態存放區提供者實作的範例，請參閱[實作工作階段狀態存放區提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66)。For an example of a session-state store provider implementation, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件會呼叫方法，然後再呼叫其他任何方法。The object calls the method before calling any other method. 您可以使用方法來執行任何您的工作階段狀態存放區提供者所需的每一個要求初始化。You can use the method to perform any per-request initialization required by your session-state store provider. ## Examples 如需工作階段狀態存放區提供者實作的範例，請參閱[實作工作階段狀態存放區提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66)。For an example of a session-state store provider implementation, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66).

param.name: context

summary.span: 釋放工作階段資料存放區中項目的鎖定。

span.span: Releases a lock on an item in the session data store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件會呼叫方法來更新到期日，並釋放工作階段資料存放區中的項目上的鎖定。The object calls the method to update the expiration date and release a lock on an item in the session data store. 在要求中，結尾處呼叫期間事件，如果工作階段的值為不變。It is called at the end of a request, during the event, if session values are unchanged. 如果工作階段值已經被修改，物件會改為呼叫方法。If session values have been modified, the object instead calls the method. 物件也會呼叫方法時的鎖定工作階段資料存放區中的項目已超過值。The object also calls the method when a lock on an item in the session data store has exceeded the value. 鎖定的詳細資訊和詳細資料的鎖定識別碼，請參閱 < 鎖定工作階段存放區資料 > 中類別概觀。For more information about locking and details about the lock identifier, see "Locking Session-Store Data" in the class overview. 方法只會移除鎖定目前的應用程式符合提供的工作階段的工作階段資料存放區中的項目`id`和`lockId`值。The method only removes the lock from an item in the session data store for the current application that matches the supplied session `id` and `lockId` values. 如果`lockId`不符的資料存放區中的一個方法不會執行任何動作。If the `lockId` does not match the one in the data store, the method does nothing. ## Examples 如需工作階段狀態存放區提供者實作的範例，請參閱[實作工作階段狀態存放區提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66)。For an example of a session-state store provider implementation, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66).

span.span: Deletes item data from the session data store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件會呼叫結尾的要求，方法期間事件，若要從工作階段資料存放區刪除的資料工作階段項目，如果呼叫方法。The object calls the method at the end of a request, during the event, to delete the data for a session item from the session data store if the method has been called. 只有符合提供的工作階段的目前應用程式的工作階段資料`id`和`lockId`刪除值。Only session data for the current application that matches the supplied session `id` and `lockId` values is deleted. 鎖定的詳細資訊和詳細資料的鎖定識別碼，請參閱 < 鎖定工作階段存放區資料 > 中類別概觀。For more information about locking and details about the lock identifier, see "Locking Session-Store Data" in the class overview. ## Examples 如需工作階段狀態存放區提供者實作的範例，請參閱[實作工作階段狀態存放區提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66)。For an example of a session-state store provider implementation, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66).

summary.span: 更新工作階段資料存放區中項目的到期日與時間。

span.span: Updates the expiration date and time of an item in the session data store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件會呼叫方法，以更新的到期日期和時間工作階段目前的日期和時間加上工作階段值時可能是：The object calls the method to update the expiration date and time for a session to the current date and time plus the session value when either: - 屬性是`true`，或the attribute is `true`, or - 要求未發出和事件，因為發生錯誤。the request did not raise the and events due to an error. 如果要求的 ASP.NET 網頁和屬性設為`false`、方法仍會呼叫以更新的到期日期和時間的工作階段資料存放區中的資料。If an ASP.NET page is requested and the attribute is set to `false`, the method is still called to update the expiration date and time of the data in the session data store. ## Examples 如需工作階段狀態存放區提供者實作的範例，請參閱[實作工作階段狀態存放區提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66)。For an example of a session-state store provider implementation, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66).

summary.span: 使用目前要求的值，更新工作階段狀態資料存放區中的工作階段項目資訊，並清除對資料的鎖定。

span.span: Updates the session-item information in the session-state data store with values from the current request, and clears the lock on the data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件會呼叫結尾的要求，方法期間事件，將目前的工作階段項目資訊插入至資料存放區，或使用目前的值，更新資料存放區中的現有工作階段項目資訊若要更新的到期時間，項目，並釋放的鎖定資料。The object calls the method at the end of a request, during the event, to insert current session-item information into the data store or update existing session-item information in the data store with current values, to update the expiration time on the item, and to release the lock on the data. 只有符合提供的工作階段的目前應用程式的工作階段資料`id`和`lockId`值更新。Only session data for the current application that matches the supplied session `id` and `lockId` values is updated. 如需有關鎖定的詳細資訊，請參閱 < 鎖定工作階段存放區資料 」 中類別概觀。For more information about locking, see "Locking Session Store Data" in the class overview. 如果目前要求的工作階段值尚未經過修改，不會呼叫方法。If the session values for the current request have not been modified, the method is not called. 相反地，方法呼叫。Instead, the method is called. 如果已呼叫方法，不會呼叫方法。If the method has been called, the method is not called. 相反地，物件會呼叫方法，以從資料來源中刪除工作階段項目資料。Instead, the object calls the method to delete session-item data from the data source. ## Examples 如需工作階段狀態存放區提供者實作的範例，請參閱[實作工作階段狀態存放區提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66)。For an example of a session-state store provider implementation, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66).

span.span: if the session-state store provider supports calling the event; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件會呼叫方法來判斷模組初始化時是否呼叫`Session_OnEnd`所支援事件實作以及關聯活動委派`Session_OnEnd`事件。The object calls the method when the module is initialized to determine whether calls to the `Session_OnEnd` event are supported by the implementation and to associate the delegate with the `Session_OnEnd` event. 自訂工作階段狀態存放區提供者實作者應該使用方法，以通知物件是否呼叫`Session_OnEnd`支援事件，並設定的本機參考所提供的委派`expireCallback`參數。Custom session-state store provider implementers should use the method to inform the object whether calls to the `Session_OnEnd` event are supported and to set a local reference to the delegate supplied by the `expireCallback` parameter. 自訂實作必須決定何時本機會呼叫委派。The custom implementation must decide when the local delegate will be called. 例如，無法呼叫委派的呼叫期間放棄工作階段時所呼叫的方法。For example, the delegate could be called during the call to the method, which is called when a session is abandoned. ## Examples 如需工作階段狀態存放區提供者實作的範例，請參閱[實作工作階段狀態存放區提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66)。For an example of a session-state store provider implementation, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66).
